channel.title: Pebbles on NiceTux by Matthew Hungerford
channel.description: Recent content in Pebbles on NiceTux by Matthew Hungerford

item.title: Pandas and bananas
item.description: Simple but fun game “Pandas and Bananas” I created for the Pebble Smartwatch. I later worked with Chris Lewis to incorporate the collision code from this game into the PGE (Pebble Game Engine) framework for use by other games. This game includes assets from https://opengameart.org Youtube Gameplay Video
